title: The Mysteries of a Hairdresser's Shop

sources.title: The Mysteries of a Hairdresser's Shop

metadata.Plot: Karl Valentin plays a journeyman in a barber shop who prefers to stay in bed than to take care of his (already heavily bearded) customers. When he's at work, he removes boils with hammer, chisel and pincers, turns long-haired men into skin-heads and chops off people's heads.
metadata.Writer: Bertolt Brecht, Erich Engel, Karl Valentin
metadata.Actors: Blandine Ebinger, Karl Valentin, Erwin Faber
